oai_dc:dc.dc:title: CRR, University of Exeter: Policy and socio-economic research
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Policy environments and social economy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Centre for Rural Research, University of Exeter undertakes research across a wide range of rural issues. Much of this work is connected to the land based sector and is conducted by a team of 20 social science researchers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Facility} CRR, University of Exeter: Policy and socio-economic research. Facility Leader(s): Winter, Prof Michael, University of Exeter.
